mapper.insert: insert into iims_integral_admin(id, name, username, email, password, phone, sex, id_number, avatar, role, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{avatar}, #{role}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select * from iims_integral_admin
and is_deleted = 0
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')

SELECT r.id,r.role_name, r.role_en, r.menus FROM iims_integral_admin a JOIN iims_integral_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(a.role, CONCAT('\"', CAST(r.id AS CHAR), '\"')) WHERE a.id = #{userId} AND a.is_disable = 0;

SELECT m.* FROM iims_integral_admin a JOIN iims_integral_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(a.role, CONCAT('\"', CAST(r.id AS CHAR), '\"')) JOIN iims_integral_menu m ON JSON_CONTAINS(r.menus, CONCAT('\"', CAST(m.id AS CHAR), '\"')) WHERE a.id = #{userId} AND m.`status` = 1 ORDER BY parent_id, order_num;
